input.sentences: the firework show started off slowly
after it kicked off it light up the sky .
their were many different colors | and hues .
the big finale near the end was very exciting .
output.sentences: It was the fourth of July and a fireworks show was slowly starting.
The show kicked off with the sky lighting up with a red glow.
The sky was alight with different color hues.
Purple and magenta hues were a hit among the crowd watching the firework display.
The finale was the most exciting and the crowd went even more wild with delight.
